content.rendered:
Holiday shopping can be tough. Between the crazy traffic, long lines and dwindling stock of items, shopping during December is much more pleasant when it's done online. If you are looking for the perfect last minute gift, look no further than AVA! Here are some of the best gift ideas from AVA.

  1. Overnight Rafting Trip
    There's not much better than waking up on Christmas morning to learn that you are not only going rafting in 2017, but you are going rafting and camping riverside! Our overnight rafting trips are the perfect gifts for your family, friends and even coworkers. Sure, they will have to wait a couple months to take the actual trip, but the anticipation and excitement will continue to build while they countdown to their adventure! Bonus, all overnight rafting trips are $50 off per person! Book online with code 50RAFT17, or give our trip specialists a call at 877-RAFTING (877-723-8464). Check our deals page for more information. 
     
  2. Photos from Past Trip
    If you took a trip with us recently and did not purchase your photos, this is the perfect gift for whoever you shared that experience with! Head to our photo shop to purchase your pictures. If you are having trouble finding your photos, give our office a call.
     
  3. Gear from the AVA Shop
    Find the perfect shirt, sweatshirt, swim trunks and pajama pants over at the AVA Shop! 
     
  4. Gift Cards
    If you would like to give the gift that keeps on giving, AVA gift cards will do the trick! You can purchase a certain dollar amount, or pre-pay for a specific trip allowing the giftee to give us a call to book for the time and day that best works for them.

As always we are happy to help and answer any questions. Our office is currently open 8am-6pm daily and can be reached at 877-723-8464. We look forward to seeing you in 2017!
